products.name: Sweet Tomato Makhana
products.description: Rich in protein, low on the glycemic index, and free from additives. Our DIY packs empower families to season it their way—mild, spicy, bold—while consciously controlling fat and flavor.

products.name: Minty Masala Makhana
products.description: A refreshing twist on traditional fox nuts with aromatic mint and spices. Perfect for health-conscious snacking.

products.name: Classic Sattu
products.description: The humble roasted gram flour, a powerhouse of plant protein, fiber, and minerals. Whether sipped, stuffed, or dough, its versatility fits right into the modern kitchen.

products.name: Masala Sattu
products.description: Traditional sattu enhanced with aromatic spices. Supporting digestion, energy, and immunity for growing children, active adults, and busy mornings alike.

products.name: Jaljira Sattu
products.description: Naturally sweetened sattu with jaggery. A perfect balance of nutrition and taste for the whole family.

products.name: Peri Peri Makhana
products.description: Spicy peri peri flavored fox nuts for those who love a kick in their healthy snacks. Guilt-free crunch without compromise.
